quote: There's a lot of stress... but once you get in the car, all that goes out the window.
name: Dan Brown

quote: The way I drive, the way I handle a car, is an expression of my inner feelings.
name: Lewis Hamilton

quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
name: Prince Philip

quote: The cars we drive say a lot about us.
name: Alexandra Paul

quote: Maybe the bike is more dangerous, but the passion for the car for me is second to the bike.
name: Valentino Rossi

quote: A dream without ambition is like a car without gas... you're not going anywhere.
name: Sean Hampton

quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
name: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: I couldn't find the sports car of my dreams, so I built it myself.
name: Ferdinand Porsche

quote: There's three things men always talk about - women, sports, and cars.
name: Mario Lopez

quote: Giving money and power to government is like giving whiskey and car keys to teenage boys.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Shoes make an outfit; they're like rims for a car.
name: Omari Hardwick

quote: One person's car is another person's scenery.
name: Jonathan Ive

quote: I race to win. If I am on the bike or in a car it will always be the same.
name: Valentino Rossi

quote: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself.
name: Dale Earnhardt

quote: I've always been asked, 'What is my favorite car?' and I've always said 'The next one.'
name: Carroll Shelby

quote: My wife wants sex in the back of the car and she wants me to drive.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Cars are the sculptures of our everyday lives.
name: Chris Bangle

quote: I'm a typical guy. Driving cars and speed are really fun.
name: Luke Mably

quote: Yeah, it's risky, but no more risky than driving a car.

quote: You don't have to carry a designer bag that costs more than a car to look cool.
name: Kesha

quote: The time is right for electric cars - in fact the time is critical.
name: Carlos Ghosn

quote: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
name: E. B. White

quote: A perfect day would be to get into the car, drive out to Yosemite and go camping.
name: Michael Steger

quote: We at BMW do not build cars as consumer objects, just to drive from A to B. We build mobile works of art.
name: Chris Bangle

quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: People think getting a new partner is like getting a new car.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: The automobile engine will come, and then I will consider my life's work complete.
name: Rudolf Diesel

quote: The fact is I don't drive just to get from A to B. I enjoy feeling the car's reactions, becoming part of it.

quote: A racing car is an animal with a thousand adjustments.
name: Mario Andretti

quote: To attract men, I wear a perfume called 'New Car Interior.'

quote: My opinion is it's a bridge too far to go to fully autonomous cars.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Tesla is here to stay and keep fighting for the electric car revolution.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Women are like cars: we all want a Ferrari, sometimes want a pickup truck, and end up with a station wagon.
name: Tim Allen

quote: Electric cars are not going to take the market by storm, but it's going to be a gradual improvement.
name: Carlos Ghosn

quote: 'Cars' was about Lightning McQueen learning to slow down and to enjoy life. The journey is the reward.
name: John Lasseter

quote: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
name: Earl Wilson

quote: The creative process is mysterious; a conversation, a ride in the car, or a melody can trigger something.
name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: Win or lose, star or not, you wait for your car with everyone else, and waiting for your car is a drag.
name: Teri Garr

quote: If a neighbor is killed in a car accident, do you sell your car and stop driving?
name: Mario Andretti

quote: I did not want to spend the rest of my life not being able to ride in a nice car.
name: Shakira

quote: I had to stop driving my car for a while... the tires got dizzy.
name: Steven Wright

quote: I don't want to die in a car accident. When I die it'll be a glorious day. It'll probably be a waterfall.
name: River Phoenix

quote: Fast cars are my only vice.
name: Michael Bay

quote: If you saw a dog going to be crushed under a car, wouldn't you help him?
name: Oskar Schindler

quote: Electric cars are going to be very important for urban transportation.
name: Carlos Ghosn

quote: Every great device, gadget, electric car, and robot would be even greater if batteries didn't suck so badly.
name: Steven Levy

quote: I love cars, but I love bikes more.
name: Candace Kita

quote: Whither goest thou, America, in thy shiny car in the night?
name: Jack Kerouac

quote: Fast cars like Porsches and Ferraris - they are things of beauty.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: I'm as passionate as any car owner or car collector that has one car or 300 cars.
name: Bill Goldberg

quote: Family and God - that is what's important. Money, cars, those are things that come and go.
name: Fabrice Muamba

quote: The biggest reason we want autonomous cars is to prevent accidents.
name: Oren Etzioni

quote: I had a friend who was a clown. When he died, all his friends went to the funeral in one car.
name: Steven Wright

quote: I was hit by a car once on my bike, but I still rode home.

quote: It seems to me I spent my life in car pools, but you know, that's how I kept track of what was going on.
name: Barbara Bush

quote: I spent a lot of money on booze, birds and fast cars. The rest I just squandered.
name: George Best

quote: I've always had an affinity and a passion for cars and that whole car culture.
name: Ludacris

quote: I'm enjoying the money, the big house, the cars; what ghetto kid wouldn't?
name: O. J. Simpson

quote: I have some wonderful suits in my closet, a lovely car, some refined watches.
name: Pierce Brosnan

quote: I admit to wasting my life messing around with fast cars and motorcycles.
name: Brock Yates

quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: When you are fitted in a racing car and you race to win, second or third place is not enough.
name: Ayrton Senna

quote: Engineers are behind the cars we drive, the pills we pop and the way we power our homes.
name: James Dyson

quote: Sometimes movie-making happens like clockwork; other times, like a car accident.
name: Eric Roberts

quote: Flying cars are not a very efficient way to move things from one point to another.
name: Bill Gates

quote: Car designers are just going to have to come up with an automobile that outlasts the payments.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: We're in a giant car heading towards a brick wall and everyone's arguing over where they're going to sit.

quote: I'm glad to see that BMW is bringing an electric car to market. That's cool.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Self-driving cars are the natural extension of active safety and obviously something we should do.

quote: When a police officer tells you to stay in the car, you stay in the car.

quote: I have bad reflexes. I was once run over by a car being pushed by two guys.

quote: I only know it takes weeks to recover, as if one had been in a car accident.

quote: Jeep represents a way of life. It's not just a car.
name: Sergio Marchionne

quote: My first car was a BMW. A white BMW.

quote: There's nothing wrong with the car except that it's on fire.

quote: There's an unseen force which lets birds know when you've just washed your car.

quote: Cars and cameras are the two things I let myself be materialistic about. I don't care about other stuff.

quote: I would have probably stolen cars - it would have given me the same adrenaline rush as racing.
name: Valentino Rossi

quote: Electric cars aren't pollution-free; they have to get their energy from somewhere.

quote: I do love cars.
name: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

quote: Simply racing a Formula 1 car is an achievement.
name: Sebastian Vettel

quote: I never listen to the radio unless I rent a car.
name: David Byrne

quote: When I was 16, everyone else got a car; I got a motorcycle.
name: Jason Priestley

quote: If you own a home with wheels on it and several cars without, you just might be a redneck.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: We aren't addicted to oil, but our cars are.
name: James Woolsey

quote: It's not food if it arrived through the window of your car.
name: Michael Pollan

quote: A doctor is not a mechanic. A car doesn't react with a mechanic, but a human being does.

quote: When you have fast cars and bad luck, it's a lot easier to handle than having slow cars and bad luck.

quote: I have an answering machine in my car. It says, I'm home now. But leave a message and I'll call when I'm out.
name: Steven Wright

quote: I replaced the headlights in my car with strobe lights, so it looks like I'm the only one moving.

quote: I love driving my car on any highway.
name: Virat Kohli

quote: A new car is not going to change your life.
name: Monica Ali

quote: Success is not two cars or a swimming pool. It's the approval of your peers.
name: Peter Finch

quote: I know a lot about cars, man. I can look at any car's headlights and tell you exactly which way it's coming.

quote: I grew up on the back of a motorcycle - my dad didn't have a car until I was a teenager.
name: Aisha Tyler

quote: What Englishman will give his mind to politics as long as he can afford to keep a motor car?
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Whenever I drive under a yellow light, I always kiss my finger and tap it on the roof of the car.
name: Jared Padalecki

quote: Say yes to everything. 'You want me to buy you some food?' Yes. 'You want me to buy you a car?' Yes.
name: Cardi B

quote: Selling an electric sports car creates an opportunity to fundamentally change the way America drives.
name: Elon Musk

quote: My first car was a motorcycle.
name: Adam Carolla

quote: Every little kid has always wanted to be a race car driver. This gets some of that out.
name: David Alan Grier

quote: I am at the top of Toyota and drive cars myself. I was also born with this name.

quote: I love fast cars... and to go too fast in them.
name: Lara Flynn Boyle

quote: Electric cars are coal-powered cars. Their carbon emissions can be worse than gasoline-powered cars.

quote: When I am driving my car down the street, I try not to go down the potholes.

quote: My husband is pretty particular about his cars. In his opinion, the Mercedes are the best of the best.

quote: I've exercised with women so thin that buzzards followed them to their cars.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Nobody wants to buy a $60,000 electric Civic. But people will pay $90,000 for an electric sports car.
name: Elon Musk

quote: I really enjoy not getting in a car and running errands on bikes.

quote: I could never drive in a great big car; people like me because I'm a man of the people, a hustler.

quote: Tesla is becoming a real car company.

quote: I know I'm not supposed to like muscle cars, but I like muscle cars.

quote: I like to sing around the bonfire, in my car and in the shower.

quote: I don't like new cars; I'm into vintage cars - there's a Jaguar E-Type in the 'Goldie' video.

quote: If all the cars in the United States were placed end to end, it would probably be Labor Day Weekend.

quote: I've never been to a race car race before.

quote: When you have a great car, you want people to see the car.

quote: On the roads, it is one of those 'might is right' situations. If I see cars coming, I duck out of the way.

quote: Onion rings in the car cushions do not improve with time.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: It goes without saying that you should never have more children than you have car windows.

quote: My buildings are not particularly expensive. It is not a tin shed. If you want a tinny car, you pay for that.

quote: I love technology - yes, I have fallen in love with older cars, but I'm all for new technology.

quote: I want a pit crew... I hate the procedure I currently have to go through when I have car problems.

quote: Forget the damned motor car and build the cities for lovers and friends.

quote: White is actually one of my favorite colors. I have a white car. I love white.

quote: We're going to test with the same car, but we have a new car ready.
name: Larry Dixon

quote: I think about cars to try and distract myself. It's a good way to relax, take your mind off everything.

quote: I've always been into cars. Cars are part of our genetic makeup. It's unavoidable.

quote: I spent a lot of time behind the Iron Curtain, and their cars were abysmal.

quote: Driving race cars was an avenue for me to learn how to build my own car, and that was my ambition all along.

quote: I don't think I'm a celebrity. I'm just a guy from east Texas who loves cars and airplanes.
name: Carroll Shelby

quote: Bullies now aren't just jocks. They're rich kids in the nice cars with the fancy clothes.

quote: I'm a crazy car guy. I've got an airplane hangar full of cars.

quote: I've always wanted to race cars, ever since I was a young boy, as I think a lot of guys have.

quote: I don't even like old cars. I'd rather have a goddam horse. A horse is at least human, for God's sake.

quote: When my car runs out of gas, I buy a new one. I don't want to ride around in a quitter.

name: Lewis Hamilton

quote: A car is useless in New York, essential everywhere else. The same with good manners.

quote: But my passion is racing cars. It's what I like to do in my off time.

quote: I've crashed my car three times.

quote: I don't race cars.

quote: I've got CDs in my car, listening all the time for that next song, because everybody's looking.

quote: Guns do kill. Unlike cars, that is all they do.

quote: I'm not a collector. I don't like the toy cupboard syndrome that causes so many good cars to evaporate.

quote: Older cars tend to drive like older cars. That is not for me.

quote: I'm sort of like a lame, single guy in a red sports car.

quote: I like American cars. And I would do nothing to hurt the U.S. auto industry.

quote: Come rain or shine I walk short distances rather than taking my car.

quote: I know I will die in a car crash.

quote: When the car's going well, I purr like a kitten.

quote: When I'm in the car, I want the only one shouting to be me.

quote: My whole family can talk. They are all car salesmen. They are all funny.

quote: Everybody has a gun in their car in Detroit.
name: Jim Harrison

quote: When it comes to cars, only two varieties of people are possible - cowards and fools.

quote: My hobbies and leisure activities include cars and golf.

quote: I think all males from Detroit have an obsession with cars.

quote: Ikea people do not drive flashy cars or stay at luxury hotels.

quote: Cars, furs, and gems were not my weaknesses.

quote: But to personally satisfy my own adrenalin needs, I've been racing cars a little bit, which has been fun.

quote: No action hero is more closely associated with cars than James Bond.

name: Ryan Tedder

quote: Horses and mules, and even sail cars, made more rapid progress than did the earliest locomotive.
name: John Moody

name: Jason Behr

quote: I don't buy fur coats or jewelry. I have old cars.
